name: Cubanoids
description:
Cubanoids is a mix of action and survival game.
Game developed entirely by one person

Sit down, turn on the game and relax.

Key features:

• Single player
• Local cooperative for 2 players
• Two different game modes
- Survival
- Hero Defense
• Low-poly graphics
• 7 characters
• Controller support
• Two arenas
• Creeps, powerups and fun
